# Packages

```{r include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(GGally)
library(magrittr)
```


# Data

## Load
```{r}
wind_data <- read.delim("../Data/tuno.txt", header = T, sep = " ")
summary(wind_data)
```

## Plot

```{r}
# ggpairs(~pow.obs + ws30 + wd30, wind_data)
pairplot  <- ggpairs(wind_data, columns = c("pow.obs", "ws30", "wd30", "r.day"))
pairplot
ggsave("Plots/pairplot_wind.png", pairplot)
```
